borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Proposed EE 1No UHF GPS module at 23.25m I.D No 456311 to be installed on antenna support Pole. Proposed EE 3No HUAWEI AOC4518R8V06 Antenna at 22.0m mean height bearing 332° 62° and 180° E T N I.D Nos  456301 , 456303 and 456304 to be installed on proposed steelwork. Proposed 2No faceframes C/W 3No CHS88 90x5mm 2.5mLonf Support Poles. Proposed EE 3No 5258 RRU I.D Nos 456305 , 456306 and 456307 to be installed no more than 3.0m away from proposed antenna fixed to proposed support pole. Proposed EE 3No BOBs I.D Nos 456308 456309 and 456310 to be installed on antennas support pole. Proposed EE 3No Hybird cables to be installed existing cable management to be utilised. Proposed EE 3 No BOBs I.D Nos 457001 457002 and 457003 to be installed on gantry pole. Proposed EE 1No APM5930/AC Cabinet to be installed on concrete base.
